004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import kut.Js;
008import kut.Arr;
009
010/** Order data. */
011public class Order {
012  /** Order date. */
013  public final String date;
014  /** Company nick. */
015  public final String nick;
016  /** mkt.Cts.orderBuy or mkt.Cts.orderSell. */
017  public final int type;
018  /** Stocks number. */
019  public final int stocks;
020  /** Price of each stock. */
021  public final double price;
022
023  /**
024   * Constructor.
025   * @param date Order date.
026   * @param nick Company nick.
027   * @param type mkt.Cts.orderBuy or mkt.Cts.orderSell.
028   * @param stocks Stocks number.
029   * @param price Price of each stock.
030   */
031  public Order (String date, String nick, int type, int stocks, double price) {
032    this.date = date;
033    this.nick = nick;
034    this.type = type;
035    this.stocks = stocks;
036    this.price = price;
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * Returns object JSONized.
041   * @param o Ditto.
042   * @return Ditto.
043   */
044  public static String toJs (Order o) {
045    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
046      Js.w(o.date),
047      Js.w(o.nick),
048      Js.w(o.type),
049      Js.w(o.stocks),
050      Js.w(o.price, 4)
051    ));
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Returns Object from JSON.
056   * @param js JSON string.
057   * @return Ditto.
058   */
059  public static Order fromJs (String js) {
060    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
061    return new Order(
062      Js.rs(a.get(0)),
063      Js.rs(a.get(1)),
064      (int)Js.rn(a.get(2)),
065      (int)Js.rn(a.get(3)),
066      Js.rn(a.get(4))
067    );
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Returns the number of orders type mkt.Cts.orderBuy of 'Os'.
072   * @param os Orders.
073   * @return Ditto.
074   */
075  public static int buys (ArrayList<Order> os) {
076    int c = 0;
077    for (Order o : os) if (o.type == Cts.orderBuy) ++c;
078    return c;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Returns the number of orders type mkt.Cts.orderSell of 'Os'.
083   * @param os Orders.
084   * @return Ditto.
085   */
086  public static int sales (ArrayList<Order> os) {
087    int c = 0;
088    for (Order o : os) if (o.type == Cts.orderSell) ++c;
089    return c;
090  }
091
092}
